original_text: And to the woman were given two wings of a great eagle, that she might fly into the wilderness, into her place, where she is nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.
korean_text: 그 여자가 큰 독수리의 두 날개를 받아 광야 자기 곳으로 날아가 거기서 그 뱀의 낯을 피하여 한 때와 두 때와 반 때를 양육 받으매

sentences.original_text: And to the woman were given two wings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 여인에게 두 날개가 주어졌으며

sentences.original_text: that she might fly into the wilderness
for a time, and times, and half a time
sentences.korean_translation: 한 때와 두 때와 반 때 동안

sentences.original_text: from the face of the serpent
